abstract: On this week’s podcast: Miguel Helft on Google’s victory over Viacom, family-friendly online multiplayer gaming and a look at new headphones.
snippet: On this week’s podcast: Miguel Helft on Google’s victory over Viacom, family-friendly online multiplayer gaming and a look at new headphones.
lead_paragraph: In this week’s New York Tech Talk podcast, Bettina Edelstein speaks with Miguel Helft, who has followed Viacom’s lawsuit against Google over  copyright infringement of YouTube videos.

headline.main: Tech Talk Podcast: Videos and Video Games
